name: T - Carlos Kate
_source: speak;Carlos; I'm not! I'm just{tgm}...{tgm}running towards the enemy!{w} Have to kill the demons and all that.
speak;Kate; Don't think you're going to get away with defying my orders.
speak;Carlos; Don't worry. I'm sure I'll be hearing about it for the rest of my life.
speak;Kate; Do away with the attitude, Mister Tactician.
speak;Carlos; I said it's time to get back to the battle at hand!
